title: If I don't get a loss prevented, shit's gonna hit the fan.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/d5e3a033d6a9cbaa61a36137209375c0.jpg

Spend the entire game on 300 ping, decide to restart the client and then this for the past fifteen minutes.

The issue isn't on my end as I have already contacted my ISP.

replies.body: Same thing happened to me. I better get loss prevented for that ARAM...
SO is there an actual fix or do we just never connect to games and then never connect to the client again? I wanted to play a game before i had to leave for the day
Had the same issue, changing regions seemed to force the client to patch and fix the issue. Rip lp.

Same thing happened to me. After a couple of tries of restarting and reopening the client it said it went back to a previous patch. Let me in and then i was able to play my game. Then after it patched.
